## Public Member Functions

### allocateScavengingFrameIndexesNearIncomingSP() {#ade83f160505e1b191dc7cac8e9c3a7a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SystemZFrameLowering::allocateScavengingFrameIndexesNearIncomingSP (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Control the placement of special register scavenging spill slots when allocating a stack frame.

If this returns true, the frame indexes used by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> will be allocated closest to the incoming stack pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasReservedCallFrame() {#a46fc8db3cce495e6eb3bd900d6027430}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SystemZFrameLowering::hasReservedCallFrame (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
hasReservedCallFrame - Under normal circumstances, when a frame pointer is not required, we reserve argument space for call sites in the function immediately on entry to the current function.

This eliminates the need for add/sub sp brackets around call sites. Returns true if the call frame is included as part of the stack frame.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-h">SystemZFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp/#l00152">152</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzframelowering-cpp">SystemZFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
